title: Story idea I've thought of
body: For years the Summoners summoned the Runeterans to fight on the Rift. What should happen though if one of the Summoners got sent to an alternate Runeterra where Summoners and the Institute of War no longer existed? This is the story of Alex Angevin a once great Summoner who got transferred to a place where his kind never existed......

replies.body: ...So it's about a summoner from the old lore being transported to the world of the new lore?
Also sorry for the late reply I left the post alone to let the votes get in

Pretty much, I had this idea before but I haven't been able to play League for over a yr and a half or so due to my computer being a toaster on a potato router and the s.o.b's that made it sodered my secondary ram slot shut I can only max out at 16 gb of ram anyways I didn't know Summoners were taken out of the lore till just recently so the idea kinda flows better now
